/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about the
Decision
section of the rating decision, including
purpose of the
Decision
section
organizing the
Decision
section
handling issues within scope of a claim
using diagnostic terminology to name issues
changes in diagnostic codes (DCs)
, and
avoiding the use of free-text contentions in VBMS-R
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A - Completing the Rating Decision Narrative
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A
